title: Calories in a Honeycrisp Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in a honeycrisp apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Medium Honeycrisp apple (~182 g), raw, with skin, unpeeled; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, variety, and storage; Honeycrisp may differ slightly from other apples. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A medium Honeycrisp apple provides ~95 kcal and ~4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium Honeycrisp apple.

faqs.q: What are the carbs and fiber in a honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: â‰ˆ25 g carbs and 4.4 g fiber per medium apple.

faqs.q: Does a honeycrisp apple have much protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: ~0.5 g protein and 0.3 g fat per apple.

faqs.q: How do honeycrisp apples compare to other varieties?
faqs.a: Similar to Gala or Fuji; Honeycrisp is crisp and juicy with comparable calories (~95 kcal medium).

faqs.q: Does peeling change calories in a honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: Slightly; removes ~5 kcal and some fiber from the skin.
